name: Good Boy GMTK2020
description:
BE A GOOD BOY!!

Help your owner get all of his sheep back to its cage!

Maintain your own sanity as this sheeps are not that easy to bring back to their CAGE!

Made for GMTK2020 OUT OF CONTROL game jam. Made by one person

HOW TO PLAY

You can use controller if you want, but some function may not work!

BARKWALKPAUSESPACE | AWASD | ARROWSESC
